title: New Booking Received
message: Your Toyota Camry has been booked by John Doe for 3 days. Payment of KSh 1,200 is held in escrow.

title: Payment Released
message: KSh 1,020 has been deposited to your account for the Honda CR-V rental.

title: Vehicle Return Reminder
message: BMW X5 rental ends tomorrow at 5:00 PM. Please prepare for vehicle inspection.
